data.trans_hint: Hầu hết các tội có thể thu hẹp lại thành vấn đề tiền bạc.
data.en_hint: Most of the crimes may boil down to a question of money.
data.content_game_1: Most of the crimes may boil down to a question of money.
data.answer_en_hint: Most of the crimes may boil down to a question of money.

data.trans: Dựa vào một điểm quan trọng
data.trans_hint: Lựa chọn của chúng tôi dựa vào việc ở lại đây hoặc rời khỏi đây.
data.en_hint: Our choices come down to staying here or leaving here.
data.content_game_1: Our choices come down to staying here or leaving here.
data.answer_en_hint: Our choices come down to staying here or leaving here.

data.trans: (dùng để ra lệnh) Bảo ai đó dừng làm ồn
data.trans_hint: Cô ấy ra lệnh cho lũ trẻ dừng làm ồn.
data.content_game_1: She pipes down the kids.
data.answer_en_hint: She pipes down the kids.

data.content_game_1: Oh, shut up, you fool!
data.answer_en_hint: Oh, shut up, you fool!

data.trans: Vứt bỏ cái gì đi (cái mà mình không muốn)
data.trans_hint: Sau khi anh ấy đi, cô ấy đã vứt bỏ mọi thứ khiến cô ấy nhớ về anh ta.
data.en_hint: After he left, she chucked away everything that reminds her of him.
data.content_game_1: After he left, she chucked away everything that reminds her of him.
data.answer_en_hint: After he left, she chucked away everything that reminds her of him.

data.trans: Giữ cho cái gì đó đứng được
data.trans_hint: Chúng ta sẽ sử dụng bốn cây gậy để dựng cái lều lên.
data.en_hint: We will use four sticks to hold up the tent.
data.content_game_1: We will use four sticks to hold up the tent.
data.answer_en_hint: We will use four sticks to hold up the tent.

data.trans_hint: Trước khi chúng tôi trở thành bạn cùng phòng, chúng tôi đã phải giải quyết nhiều điểm khác biệt giữa chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: Before we became roommates, we had to iron out many differences between us.
data.content_game_1: Before we became roommates, we had to iron out many differences between us.
data.answer_en_hint: Before we became roommates, we had to iron out many differences between us.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy định tổ chức một bữa tiệc bất ngờ cho cô ấy, nhưng tôi đã phá hỏng mọi thứ.
data.en_hint: He planned to throw a surprise party for her, but I mucked everthing up.
data.content_game_1: He planned to throw a surprise party for her, but I mucked everthing up.
data.answer_en_hint: He planned to throw a surprise party for her, but I mucked everthing up.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đang suy nghĩ về ý tưởng viết một cuốn sách.
data.en_hint: I've been mulling over an idea to write a book.
data.content_game_1: I've been mulling over an idea to write a book.
data.answer_en_hint: I've been mulling over an idea to write a book.

data.trans: Giữ cho cái gì đó đứng được
data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi đã đỡ cô ấy bằng gối để cô ấy có thể ngồi dậy và nói chuyện với chúng tôi.
data.en_hint: We propped her up with pillows so she could sit up and talk with us.
data.content_game_1: We propped her up with pillows so she could sit up and talk with us.
data.answer_en_hint: We propped her up with pillows so she could sit up and talk with us.

data.trans_hint: Hãy suy nghĩ kĩ càng về đề xuất của tôi trước khi bạn quyết định.
data.en_hint: Think over my proposal before you make up your mind.
data.content_game_1: Think over my proposal before you make up your mind.
data.answer_en_hint: Think over my proposal before you make up your mind.

data.trans: Mắng ai đó (vì đã làm gì sai)
data.trans_hint: Tốt hơn hết bạn nên làm bài tập về nhà của mình nếu không thì mẹ bạn sẽ mắng bạn khi bà ấy về nhà đó.
data.en_hint: You'd better go about doing your homework otherwise mom will ticked you off when she gets home.
data.content_game_1: You'd better go about doing your homework otherwise mom will ticked you off when she gets home.
data.answer_en_hint: You'd better go about doing your homework otherwise mom will ticked you off when she gets home.
